formulas.name: fieldAccess
formulas.expression: IF(({!$Permission.Sec_Application_Legal_Opini_Edit} == TRUE && {!application_editAccess} == TRUE && {!varR_Application.Loan_Information__r.Loan_Status__c} != "Survey (Data Correction)" &&((BEGINS({!varR_Application.Legal_Opini_Approval_Id__r.OwnerId}, {!$User.Id}) && ISBLANK({!varR_Application.Delegated_LAO__c})) || BEGINS({!varR_Application.Delegated_LAO__c}, {!$User.Id}) && {!varR_Application.Legal_Opini_Approval_Id__r.IsLocked__c} == FALSE) || (BEGINS({!varR_Application.Legal_Opini_Approval_Id__r.Approval_Assigned__c}, {!$User.Id})) && {!varR_Application.Loan_Information__r.Loan_Status__c} != "Survey (Data Correction)" &&({!varR_Application.Legal_Opini_Approval_Id__r.Status_Approval__c} == "" || {!varR_Application.Legal_Opini_Approval_Id__r.Status_Approval__c} == "Waiting for Approval")), "None", "Readonly")
